r.s: Providing a unified API for handling Atom/RSS
r.d: XML_Feed_Parser is a parser for (the various) RSS and Atom format XML feeds. It attempts to provide a somewhat unified API while still allowing access to the full details of each feed type.
r.n: QA release Bug #16416 atom:link causes getLink to fail for RSS2.php Bug #16986 Fatal error on XML_Feed_Parser_RSS2::getEntryById() Bug #19086 RSS block picks the wrong links for articles Bug #19089 constructor doesn't respect $suppressWarnings flags Bug #19091 Warnings when image element has no title, link, or url attribute
